pages.text:
WE’RE A LOCALLY OWNED, INDEPENDENT BREWERY IN THE HEART OF
MIAMI
We started Biscayne Bay Brewing to bring Miami what it deserves: QUALITY. CRAFT. BEER.
Founded in 2012, Biscayne Bay Brewing Company is committed to growing the beer culture of Miami. With a focus on classic styles of beer, Biscayne Bay Brewing has built a reputation for quality above all else. Giving back is an important part of BBBC’s philosophy; not just delicious craft beer but also by service to others. As a member of the community, BBBC continually collaborates with local service organizations by sponsoring events and opening its brewery for their use to raise resources and awareness for important causes.
We’re proud that we’ve given back to and or have collaborated with:
The Education Fund
•
Friends of Biscayne Bay
•
Boys and Girls Club of Miami
•
St. Jude Children’s Hospital
• Fort Lauderdale Science Museum •
Miami Waterkeeper
